action.action-desc: Mr. Filner introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend chapter 33 of title 38, United States Code, to increase educational assistance for certain veterans pursuing a program of education offered through distance learning.

section.header: Increase of educational assistance for certain veterans pursuing a program of education offered through distance learning
section.text: Section 3313(c)(1)(B)(i) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking the following: (other than, in the case of assistance under this section only, a program of education offered through distance learning).
